Scott William Atlas (born July 5, 1955) is an American neuroradiologist, professor, commentator, and health care policy advisor.
Contrary to the recommendations of most of the scientific community, Atlas has pushed for establishing herd immunity and a faster reopening of schools and businesses during the COVID-19 pandemic.
